PHRASE.LANG: These balloons are a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Happy Times Award" for winning three races in a row betting 3 or more coins on the winning horse. [#Legal]

Ces ballons sont une récompense de "A Day At The Races" article course de chevaux. C'est le "Happy Times Award" pour avoir remporté 3 courses d'affilée paris 3 ou plusieurs pièces de monnaie sur le cheval gagnant. [#Legal]
These balloons are a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Happy Times Award" for winning three races in a row betting 3 or more coins on the winning horse. [#Legal]
